Slow living, elevated.

Solan is more than a stop between Chandigarh and Shimla. It’s a whole district of towns and villages, fairs and factories, schools and universities. From mushrooms and breweries to pharma labs and temples, Solan shows how Himachal balances tradition with change.

SIRMAUR

Our Hidden Favourites (Himachalites Recommends)

  • Sherpa Resort, Solan: Our favourite weekend getaway with views and food.
  • Aunty ka Dhaba, Chail: Comfort food served with warmth
  • Chai Point, near Jatoli Temple: A simple tea stop with temple breeze.
  • Phantom Hill, Solan: A quiet spot for the perfect sunset.
  • Karol ka Tibba: A trek with panoramic views and peace at the top.
  • Kaali ka Tibba, Chail: A temple on a hill with unforgettable 360° views of the Shivaliks.

Our Stories in Motion

Breathtaking views of the Solan valley.
